CODIF_DATA.TY_TYPE_BID: Submission for one or more lots

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Reagents, materials and calibrators for the control of blood transmitted diseases for apparatus Architect i2000sr '' or equivalent '' for Chemylumimsence Test Method

LOCATION.P: Pho Institute of Transfusion Medicine of Republic of Macednia-Skopje located at Vodnjanska 17 St.,Skopje

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part 1 — Reagent for detection of HbsAg applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 2 — Reagent for detection of Anti HCV applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 3 — Reagent for detection of HIV Ag/Att Combo applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 4 — Reagent for detection of Syphilis (TP) applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 5 — HbsAg calibrator applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 6 — HbsAg control applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 7 — Anti HCV calibrator applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 8 — Anti HCV control applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 9 — HIV calibrator applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 10 — HIV control applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 11— Syphilis calibrator applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 12 — Syphilis control applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 13 — Rubber bottle caps for reagents applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 14 — Replaceable plastic bottle caps for reagents applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.

Part 15 — Concentrated solution for washing needles internally and reactive cells (1.5 M phosphate puffer with tolerance of + / - 1 %) applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.

Part 16 — Solution for chemiluminescent pre-activation in analysis sample (1.32 % hydrogen peroxide with tolerance of + / - 1 %) applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.

Part 17 — Solution for chemiluminescent activation in analysis sample (PEG oxyphenyl ether 1.98 % and NaOH 1.38 % with tolerance of + / - 1 %) applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 18 — Plastic cups for sample application, calibrators and controls applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 19 — Reactive cells applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.
Part 20 — Solution for needle conditioning (recalcifying human plasma) applicable to immune analyzer Architect i2000sr "or equivalent" for Chemylumimsence test method.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Guarantee for quality execution of the contract: A condition for signing a contract with the most favourable economic operator is to provide a bank guarantee by the tenderer who is selected as the most favourable as well as for implementation of the contract in a quality manner in amount of 5 % of the value of the contract, VAT excluded.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — Document for registered activity — DRD form or certificate of registered activity,
— Decision for wholesale trade with medical supplies under the Law on medicines and Medical appliances,

— a statement by the economic operator that it has not been imposed a legally valid court decision for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering for the last 5 years;
— a certificate by a competent authority that a bankruptcy procedure has not been initiated,
— a certificate by a competent authority that a liquidation procedure has not been initiated,
— a certificate by a competent authority from the country where that economic operator is registered for paid taxes, contributions and other public duties,

— a certificate by the Register of sentences for committed crimes of legal entities that a secondary sentence prohibition on participation in open call procedures, awarding public procurement contracts and contracts for public private partnership, has not been imposed,
— a certificate by the Register of sentences for committed crimes of legal entities that a secondary sentence.
Temporary or permanent prohibition on performing a certain activity has not been inpoused and

— a certificate that a misdemeanor sanction resulting in prohibition for practicing profesion performing activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing a particular activity has not been imposed by a legally valid court decision.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — For the offered goods the economic operator must have provided an Approval for marketing of medical device or temporary or permanent Authorization for parallel imports, under the Law on medicines and Medical devices.
— For the offered goods the economic operator must have provided a document that authorizes the import (Approval for intervention import) under the Law on Medicines and Medical devices.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — a Decision for marketing of medical device or temporary or permanent Authorization for parallel imports, under the Law on medicines and Medical devices.
— Import license (Authorization for Intervention Import) under the Law on medicines and Medical devices.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: Additional information about electronic auction: All qualified contractors will be informed and invited for e auction

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Pho Institute of transfusion medicine of the Republic of Macedonia Skopje, located on Vodnjanska 17 St.,Skopje — Meeting Hall

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Persons who want to be present at the opening of tenders must have authorisation letter from his/her economic operator.
